basic.description: This course covers the solution of first order quasi-linear partial differential equations; classification and reduction to normal form of linear second order equations; Greens function; infinite domain problems; the wave equation; radiation condition; spherical harmonics.
basic.subject: MAP
basic.title: Elementary Partial Differential Equations II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MAP 5345; or MAP 4341 and MAP 4342 or instructor permission.
